title: [Large-Scale] Asynchronous Video-Based Science Manager Leadership Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and at least 3 years of managerial experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment requiring strengthened practical application skills via project-based assessment. Considers asynchronous learning and limited technological infrastructure.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately demonstrate scientific decision-making processes at least three times in a VR simulation environment within four weeks.
Learners can propose strategies to reduce conflict situations by 80% by establishing and applying communication strategies through the reflective design of video tutorials.
Learners can structure team problem-solving scenarios into reports with five or more stages using a scientific leadership framework in project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
